source.46da008e:
df = pd.read_excel('../input/canada-dataset-from-cognitive-class/Canada.xlsx',skiprows=20,sheet_name='Canada by Citizenship')
df = df.drop(['Unnamed: 43','Unnamed: 44','Unnamed: 45','Unnamed: 46','Unnamed: 47','Unnamed: 48','Unnamed: 49','Unnamed: 50','Type','Coverage','AREA','REG','DEV'],axis=1)
df.columns = ['Country','Continent','Region','DevName']+list(range(1980,2014))
df['total'] = df.sum(axis = 1)
df.head()

source.9e5d2c85:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,10))
plt.pie(df_continents.loc['Africa':'Oceania','total_from_continent'],
        labels=list(df_continents.index)[:-1],
        startangle=90,
        autopct='%.2f%%',
        radius=10,
        pctdistance=0.9,
        labeldistance=1.1,
        textprops={'fontsize':12,'fontweight':'bold','color':'w'},
        colors=['goldenrod','firebrick','rosybrown','aliceblue','red','mediumblue'])
plt.legend(loc='upper right',bbox_to_anchor=(1.3,1.3),fontsize=12)
plt.title('Distribution of immigration - continent wise',pad=20,fontweight='bold',fontsize=14)
plt.axis('equal')
plt.show()
source.2254cc29:
plt.figure(figsize=(8,10))
df_japan = df.loc['Japan',1980:2013]
df_japan.plot(kind='box')
plt.ylabel('Number of immigrants')
plt.xticks(fontweight='bold',fontsize=12)
plt.title('Box plot of Japanese immigrants from 1980 to 2013',fontweight='bold',pad=10,fontsize=12)
plt.show()
source.ea7cf4c0:
plt.figure(figsize=(8,6))
#Cannot figure out why this isn't working

#Creating the dataframe to use it for scatter plot
df_scatter = pd.DataFrame(df.loc[:,1980:2013].sum())
df_scatter.columns = ['Total']
df_scatter.reset_index(inplace=True)
df_scatter.rename(columns={'index':'Year'},inplace=True)

plt.scatter(x=df_scatter['Year'],y=df_scatter['Total'])

plt.xticks(list(range(1980,2014)),rotation=90)

plt.xlabel('Year',fontsize=12,fontweight='bold',labelpad=15)
plt.ylabel('Total',fontsize=12,fontweight='bold',labelpad=15)

plt.title('Immigration trend to Canada overall',fontsize=14,fontweight='bold',pad=15)

plt.show()
